info.name: Windsurf AI Forecasting
info.description: Collection for testing the Windsurf AI Forecasting microservice endpoints

request.description: Check if the service is running properly
Generate a forecast based on text description
Upload a CSV file for forecasting and receive a PDF report in response

request.description: Send inventory data in JSON format for comprehensive forecasting analysis. Returns structured forecast data for dashboard integration.

response.name: Success Response

body.raw:

request.description: Generate an automated forecast based on historical data

variable.description: Optional job ID for tracking forecasts
